body: As my username implies I like netorare but this artist just doesn't cut it, his art is great and the girls hot but the males are vanilla boring without any kind of real motivation and taking into account in this verse it's normal to do it with every person it's true brainless plot, I see a lot of people being against supposed repetitive lazy plots, but this one imo it's real trash.
I wanna enroll on that school.
I don't sense NTR here, in the full story both are winning 🤔
My fav doujin from Kisaragi Gunma got coloured, well that's definitely welcoming
